title: Throne and Liberty
short_description: NCSoft's next big MMORPG release goes global, guild sieges and all.
description:
NCSoft has been in the MMORPG space for years now, but ever since Lineage and Lineage II, the company hasn't hit it big on too many titles. Guild Wars 2 does well, but it that's more on ArenaNet than NCSoft. Fans have been waiting for "Lineage III" forever. After multiple false starts and restarts, Throne and Liberty has risen from the ashes of Lineage Eternal and aims to bring something new to MMOs.

Featuring a focus on PvP, particularly between guilds, Throne and Liberty challenges players to band together into guilds to protect castles, take over delivery routes to claim taxes, and conquer other guilds on their server. You've likely seen advertisements for the game that include examples of siege warfare and vehicle combat all taking place surrounded by spell-slinging players in flashy displays of MMO goodness.

That's not to say that Throne and Liberty is all about PvP, though. Amazon Games has worked with NCSoft to adapt the MMO slightly from its original Korean release. Making changes to PvE content, adding more things for PvE players to do, and adjusting the monetization, Amazon Games hopes to see Throne and Liberty's quasi-action combat and features land themselves with a large MMO audience.

title: Lost Ark
short_description: Journey throughout the realm of Arkesia and do battle against a demon invasion in Smilegate's free-to-play ARPG Lost Ark!
description:
Journey throughout the realm of Arkesia and do battle against a demon invasion in Smilegate's free-to-play ARPG Lost Ark! Choose from over a dozen character classes and customize your skills with the unique Tripod system, battling evil on both land and sea -- perhaps even claiming an island for your own!

Lost Ark offers PvE and PvP gameplay, including dungeons to enhance your skill proficiency and to hunt for treasure. Take part in arena PvP or take to the open seas and do battle for the richest islands. Defend your stronghold against all comers or group up with friends to seize territory and lay claim to the best spoils of war!

title: Palia
short_description: Get your cozy MMO on as you work to build your house, collect bugs, fish, and help out friends.
description:
If you dig games like Animal Crossing and other titles where the whole point is to just chill a bit, farm up some materials, build a few things, hang out with friends, and help each other build that next awesome home addition, then boy is Palia probably right up your alley.

Appearing as a human (rare in the world of Palia apparently), you are quickly given everything you need to fish, collect bugs, build and craft, and work on those relationships with NPCs in Singularity Six's free-to-play sandbox.

With a more light-hearted art style, Palia lets you get your chill on while working towards that next fantastic decoration. Of course, the MMO has quests and a storyline, but seriously, you're probably here for some late night fishing to catch that super rare that can only be found at midnight on a full moon in the rain...and you know what? No judgement here, fish on, my friend!

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel i5-7300 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300U or equivalent
minimum_system_requirements.graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580 or equivalent

title: Genshin Impact
short_description: Explore a bright and fantastical anime-styled world in miHoYo's free-to-play online RPG Genshin Impact.
description:
Explore a bright and fantastical anime-styled world in miHoYo's free-to-play online RPG Genshin Impact. Assemble your crew of adventurers and shift between them on the fly, as you journey across the world of Teyvat and fight monsters, solve puzzles, and help the townsfolk. Experience a detailed storyline and interact with a diverse cast of characters on your voyage and fight against the evils that plague the world!

Genshin Impact's action combat requires you to use multiple characters to exploit your enemies' weaknesses. Swap between them for the best effect, and increase their abilities with experience and treasure. Journey alone or team up with other players for special events for fantastic challenges and a bounty of rewards!

title: Destiny 2
short_description: Embark on a heroic quest to save humanity in Bungie's epic sci-fi MMO shooter Destiny 2, now free-to-play.
description:
Embark on a heroic quest to save humanity in Bungie's epic sci-fi MMO shooter Destiny 2, now free-to-play. Experience a wealth of content as a stalwart Titan, mysterious Warlock, or crafty Hunter, battling the enemies of humanity across the solar system. Use a mix of gunplay and special abilities to lay waste to your foes and save mankind!

Destiny 2's immersive story puts you in the heart of the action, whether it's solo play or group content. Engage in PvE three-person "strike" missions, six-person, high-pressure raids, or PvP matches against other guardians. Score the best gear to increase your guardian's capabilities and make use of the extensive cosmetic system to get the perfect look when you go into battle!

title: Hero Wars: Dominion Era
short_description: A free-to-play browser MMORPG where players assemble teams of heroes to battle against powerful enemies.
description:
Hero Wars is a 2d fantasy-themed browser-based MMORPG with tactical combat. The game focuses on hero collection, skill progression, and strategic team formation.

Players can build and customize their own teams from a wide range of heroes, each offering unique abilities and combat roles. As the adventure unfolds, new heroes, pets, and Titans become available, adding some depth and variety.

The game features both PvE and PvP modes, including a story-driven campaign, Guild Wars, and competitive Arena battles. Each mode challenges players to refine their tactics and strengthen their heroes through experience and upgrades.

title: Tower of Fantasy
short_description: Tower of Fantasy brings the MMORPG experience to PC and mobile with a F2P, splashy, anime-esque style.
description:
Tower of Fantasy has finally made its way to a global release after a few years of eager anticipation by many MMORPG fans. Available on PC and mobile devices, Tower of Fantasy puts players into the thick of catastrophic disaster. Players are part of a team of people that have been forced to leave earth, along with the rest of mankind, due to resources no longer being available to sustain life. However, our new home may not be any better even after finding a new resource called "Omnium" since radiation from the new resource seems to makes things pretty dire.

After creating your character, you'll be off exploring an open world in a mix of a fantasy/sci-fi setting with the ability to swap weapons and combat styles on the fly. The action combat style makes its way into both PvE and PvP sides of the MMORPG as you team up with friends to tackle increasingly more difficult bosses and challenges in a bright and vibrantly colored world. Like other gacha-styled games, Tower of Fantasy provides the chance to "pull" new characters (as characters are the foundation for weapons and combat styles).

minimum_system_requirements.storage: At Lease 25 GB of Available Space

title: Guild Wars 2
short_description: Guild Wars 2 represents ArenaNet's attempt to turn MMO convention on its ears and create an engaging game for players of all skill levels and play styles.
description:
Guild Wars 2 represents ArenaNet's attempt to turn MMO convention on its ears and create an engaging game for players of all skill levels and play styles. It does away with typical things like the holy trinity (tank, healer, DPS) and eschews traditional group mechanics for open-world content, which anyone can join in on without hampering other players' efforts. Even crafting nodes are shareable; there's no competition for resources or other rewards.

Guild Wars 2 offers several different types of gameplay. In addition to the open-world content, there's structured PvP, which pits teams of five players against each other, and World vs. World, a series of open-world PvP maps where players fight over castles and other fortified (and un-fortified) spots to bring their home world to victory. Characters are autoleveled to 80 in each case, so you can jump right in and start enjoying these parts of the game immediately (though the free-to-play version of the game does have its limitations).

ArenaNet is committed to a "no grind" philosophy for Guild Wars 2, in terms of gear progression. Top-tier stat gear is relatively easy to get, and the high-end gameplay typically revolves around acquiring new and different skins to customize your character's look, rather than to simply provide bigger stat bonuses. This applies to the expansions, too, which ArenaNet has said will never raise the level cap above 80, making the game easy to jump into for both new players and those who have come back to the game after a long absence.

minimum_system_requirements.os: Windows® XP Service Pack 3 or better
minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz, Core i3 OR AMD Athlon 64 X2, or better
minimum_system_requirements.graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7800, ATI X1800, Intel HD 3000, or better (256 MB of video RAM and shader model 3.0 or better)

title: Flyff Universe
short_description: Flyff Universe uses an updated graphics engine to merge some fan favorite features! Experience the Anime MMORPG anywhere through any browser.
description:
Remember Flyff? We sure do! If you have fond memories of PK’ing, gold icons, and other features of Flyff from years gone by, then Flyff Universe may just be that MMORPG punch in the nostalgia you’re looking for.

Flyff Universe uses an updated graphics engine to merge some fan favorite features from Flyff in years gone by into a brand-new universe. This new version doesn’t even require a download as it is browser based and available on PC, MAC, and mobile devices with cross play enabled.

Gala Lab does plan to add “Play-to-Earn” features soon, but those will be on their own servers for those of you that don’t want to get involved in P2E/NFTs.

title: Phantasy Star Online 2
short_description: Phantasy Star Online 2 is a free to play 3D MMORPG published by SEGA. Based on the original Dreamcast and Gamecube series, Phantasy Star Online 2 offers players the chance to visit detailed worlds and fight hundreds of interesting enemies.
description:
Phantasy Star Online 2 is a free to play 3D MMORPG published by SEGA. Based on the original Dreamcast and Gamecube series, Phantasy Star Online 2 offers players the chance to visit detailed worlds and fight hundreds of interesting enemies. PSO2 boasts large scale PvE battles with dozens of players and intricate customization options.

In Phantasy Star Online 2 players can choose between three races each with their own distinct style and attributes. Players can choose to become a fierce Hunter who uses melee weapons to slice and dice their foes, a cunning Force user who supports their allies with heals and buffs while dishing out magical damage from afar, or a Ranger who uses an assortment of guns and FPS style aiming to deal massive damage to their enemies.

On top of this players will have access to their own pets called MAGs which provide supportive abilities and can transform into giant creatures to perform astonishing abilities!

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6300 or above
minimum_system_requirements.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800 GT, AMD RADEON HD2900 XT

title: Albion Online
short_description: Albion Online is a 3D sandbox MMORPG with player freedom being at the center of the game. Players will be able to claim land, build a house, gather resources, craft items which they can use or sell, and engage in Guild vs Guild or open world PVP.
description:
Albion Online is a 3D sandbox MMORPG with player freedom being at the center of the game. Players will be able to claim land, build a house, gather resources, craft items which they can use or sell, and engage in Guild vs Guild or open world PVP. It is up to the player to decide how they want to interact with the world.

Classes are unique in that they are tied to gear. Any player can wear any piece of gear, so equipping a robe will allow the player the ability to use more powerful magic at the cost of defense. Equipping a sword and crossbow will give the player the freedom to engage in melee or ranged combat. There are quests to level your battle stats and open world PVP or Guild vs Guild also allow the player to earn experience. This is fairly important later on, as players must venture into dangerous PvP areas to harvest the most valuable resources.

Resources are abundant in the open world, but tiered based on how dangerous the location is. This means players must venture out and gather what they can. Gather too much though, and the player will begin to move slower due to the weight, making him an easy target for a rogue player or nearby mobs.

Once back at camp, the resources can then be used to build items, -such as gear and weapons- which can be used or sold to other players. Non-instanced personal housing is also available and requires the player to gather a multitude of resources in order to complete crafting. Luckily, multiple players can contribute to building one structure. Houses give players more inventory storage, provide a respawn point, give character buffs and it provide a place to hang the spoils of victory. Guilds can even take over whole cities, claiming taxes from those who live within the city, but who must also defend them against other guilds in 20 vs. 20 battles.

minimum_system_requirements.graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 support or better

title: RIFT
short_description: Rift, a once Pay-to-play MMORPG now Free to Play by Trion Worlds is set in a world being torn apart by mystical energies.
description:
Rift, a once P2P MMORPG now Free-to-Play by Trion Worlds is set in a world being torn apart by mystical energies. Play as either a Gaurdian or a Defiant in your fight for control of the ever-changing planes of Telara, choosing from 40 unique souls to create your own custom class. Be careful though, Telara is plagued with dimensional rifts that can occur at any moment, offering brave warriors untold power, or unleashing invasions of extra-planar beings bent on destruction.

Rift's soul system is quite robust. Players can opt to use three souls at a time (although more can be used by switching specs) with each one contributing unique passives and active abilities to the player's character. As a player puts more points into a singular soul, they unlock more abilities to utilize for that soul.

The MMO offers dynamic Rift events which spawn a variety of enemies in certain locations and usually require groups of players to to tackle. If players ignore these Rifts enemies will begin a crusade towards nearby towns, capturing them and preventing players from turning in quests or utilizing the hubs services. Players will then need to recapture the hub in order to regain control. Occasionally, large open world raid bosses will spawn from these Rifts which require a coordinated effort to tackle.

Rift's endgame is quite expansive, boasting multiple dungeons and raids with up to 20 people. Players looking for more open world content can participate in instant adventures which party players together in raids and have them completing multi-stage quests sprawling across a zone. PvP is also available, with Rift offering multiple Warfronts and open world PvP to take part in. Each with their own innovative mechanics and rewards.

minimum_system_requirements.graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5900, ATI/AMD Radeon X300, Intel GMA X4500 or better.

title: Star Wars: The Old Republic
short_description: Star Wars: The Old Republic (SWTOR) is a free to play 3D Sci-Fi MMORPG based on the popular Star Wars universe.
description:
Star Wars: The Old Republic (SWTOR) is a free to play 3D Sci-Fi MMORPG based on the popular Star Wars universe. SWTOR takes place 3000 years before the films, and allows players to become Jedi, Sith, Bounty Hunters, Troopers, and other iconic classes! Each class features a custom storyline, complete with fully voice acted dialogue and dynamic questions that allow players to make meaningful choices that impact their own personal story.

As players progress they will meet a variety of class specific companions, each with their own special traits and behavior. These companions come with detailed armor sets, unique abilities and personal stories that progress alongside the players. Players will also gain access to a class specific ship, which allows players to travel in between planets and engage in space combat missions.

As a Free-to-Play player, some restrictions are present when attempting PvE dungeons/raids and PvP battlegrounds. A F2P player can only participate in 5 battlegrounds and can only gain loot from the bosses in the first 3 dungeons they attempt every week; players are also restricted from doing any Raids as a completely F2P player.

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel Pentium Dual Core G6960 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3 B75 or better
minimum_system_requirements.graphics: Nvidia GeForce 465 GTX / ATI Radeon HD 5850 or better

title: Dungeons and Dragons Online
short_description: Dungeons & Dragons Online (DDO) is a free-to-play 3D Fantasy MMORPG based on the classic Dungeons and Dragons (D&D) tabletop role playing game.
description:
Dungeons & Dragons Online (DDO) is a free to play 3D Fantasy MMORPG based on the classic Dungeons and Dragons (D&D) tabletop role playing game.

The game was originally released as a subscription based game but is now free-to-play with an item shop. Dungeons & Dragons Online puts players into the heat of battle with full, real-time control over their character’s movement and special attacks.

Dungeons & Dragons Online delivers fast-paced gameplay featuring the industry’s best combat system, a massive world with great graphics and gameplay, and a rich set of features that until now could only be found in premium subscription-based MMOs.

Turbine also publishes The Lord of the Rings Online among other games.

minimum_system_requirements.processor: P4 1.6 GHz or AMD equivalent with SSE

title: The Lord of the Rings Online
short_description: The Lord of the Rings Online (LOTRO) is a free-to-play massively multiplayer online roleplaying game based on the books of J.R.R. Tolkien.
description:
The Lord of the Rings Online (LOTRO) is a free-to-play massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Turbine, based on the books of J.R.R. Tolkien. The game is a formerly pay-to-play MMORPG that is now free-to-play! Players can can now join with millions of other adventurers as they explore the most complete and authentic recreation of Middle-earth ever created and participate in LOTRO’s award-winning story up to level 50 for free, in the fight against the forces of the Dark Lord Sauron.

Adventure as a Man, Elf, Dwarf or Hobbit. After choosing where your character hails from, select region-appropriate color palettes for skin, hair, eye color, and more. Equip yourself with items like sturdy Dwarven armor, intricate Elven mail, or weapons created with the knowledge of past Ages. Choose one of 9 classes: deal massive damage as a Champion, protect your fellowship as a Guardian, beguile your enemies as a Burglar, or try a Captain, Hunter, Minstrel, Rune-Keeper, Warden, or Lore-master.

With hundreds of hours of gameplay, there's plenty to do in LOTRO as a solo player or in a fellowship. Follow the storyline on your own or form a fellowship with other players for epic battles against creatures like Orcs, Wights, and even Balrogs. Coordinated fellowships can use group combo moves to do incredible damage, heal their fellowship, or restore their energy – how they harness the power of a combo is entirely up to them to decide! LOTRO will also include a consensual Player vs. Player combat system (details forthcoming), allowing players to fight against each other for glory and honor!

Turbine also publishes Dungeons & Dragons Online among other games.

title: RuneScape
short_description: RuneScape is one of the most popular free-to-play Browser MMORPG, from the British development studio Jagex. Set in a detailed, medieval fantasy world of epic scale both geographically and historically, RuneScape proudly draws its inspiration from classic role-playing games to deliver a contemporary, innovative and original experience for millions of players across the globe, with a popular subscription option of even greater scale and ambition, both running directly within almost any computer’s browser.
description:
RuneScape is one of the most popular free-to-play Browser MMORPG, from the British development studio Jagex. Set in a detailed, medieval fantasy world of epic scale both geographically and historically, RuneScape proudly draws its inspiration from classic role-playing games to deliver a contemporary, innovative and original experience for millions of players across the globe, with a popular subscription option of even greater scale and ambition, both running directly within almost any computer’s browser.

Thanks to its character-class-free skill system and elective gameplay, there are no limits to the hero players can become, no quest you cannot complete and no requirement to collaborate with others or face them in player-versus-player combat unless you so choose. RuneScape’s distinctive role-playing style rewards players who think strategically and play smartly. Its witty, intelligent tone, finely balanced gameplay, epic questing and myriad in-world diversions combine to create a must play browser game.

title: Brighter Shores
short_description: If you are a Runescape fan, you may want to check out the latest MMORPG project from its creator.
description:
Andrew Gower.

For some MMORPG fans, saying that name may be enough to get them to try a new game. If you don't know that name, maybe saying "that's the creator of Runescape" would pick up the remaining curious players.

Brighter Shores has been a project of Gower's and Fen Research LTD for about the last decade. While Brighter Shores may have a similar style with an isometric camera and a somewhat less ambitious graphic design, don't mistake that for a lack of depth.

You're a new recruit in the Hopeport town guard and you'd like to make a name for yourself. You're going to need to learn the ropes of magic pretty quickly to become either a Cryoknight, Guardian or Hammermage, and you'll need to start mastering a huge number of professions.

While Brighter Shores is free-to-play, you will need to consider a premium pass if you want access to all the episodes the game offers.

minimum_system_requirements.graphics: DirectX 11 capable graphics with at least 2GB RAM

title: Diablo Immortal
short_description: Diablo Immortal is an all-new massively multiplayer online action RPG and Blizzard’s long advertised mobile Diablo experience (that totally was not coming to PC) comes to PC complete with all the demon slaying and looting you could want.
description:
Diablo Immortal is an all-new massively multiplayer online action RPG (MMOARPG) and Blizzard’s long advertised mobile Diablo experience (that totally was not coming to PC) comes to PC complete with all the demon slaying and looting you could want. Track down the worldstones and keep the forces of evil at bay in this cross-play and cross-progression enabled ARPG loot fest.

Rendered cutscenes and voice acting help the narrative unfold as you battle against familiar Diablo baddies and work with even more familiar Diablo characters to root out the evil corrupting the land. Difficulty scaling at higher levels provides the chance to take on more challenging foes who may drop even more rare loot.

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX-8100
minimum_system_requirements.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460, ATI Radeon HD 6850 or Intel HD Graphics 530

title: Where Winds Meet
short_description: Open-world action-adventure RPG set in ancient China!
description:
Where Winds Meet is a free-to-play open-world action-adventure RPG developed by Everstone Studios. Set in ancient China in the tenth century, in this game's story, you take on the role of a young swordmaster trying to uncover the mysteries of your past as you journey east. Customize your character, choose a role, align with a faction, and even explore unique professions to mold your character.

From lush forests and peaceful hidden temples to bustling cities, there is no shortage of places to explore as you travel across the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period of China, with thousands of points of interest set across 20+ unique regions.

Cause trouble, and face consequences. Fight however you choose: melee, ranged, or stealth, find the type of combat and weapon that suits you. Swords, spears, dual blades, rope darts, bows, fans, and umbrellas. Specialize or hone your craft and master them all as you build your legend as the Wuxia hero. Ignite change in a world of infinite possibilities.

title: Blue Protocol: Star Resonance
short_description: Blue Protocol: Star Resonance is an anime-style action MMORPG where you can raid, craft, fish, and explore the vibrant world of Regnus with others with friends.
description:
Blue Protocol: Star Resonance is an anime‑styled MMORPG that features striking visuals, detailed character customization, action combat, story-driven quests, various life skills, activity-focused socialization, and an explorable open world.

Gameplay centres on a flexible class system where characters can fill roles like tank, healer, or DPS, and swap styles as needed. Combat itself emphasizes real‑time dodging, combos, and team coordination in raids, dungeons, and world bosses. Outside combat, players can engage in life skills such as fishing, crafting, mining, and join social activities like guilds, housing, and multiplayer events.

The game supports full cross‑platform play between PC and mobile, and monetization is focused on cosmetics and optional conveniences rather than pay‑to‑win mechanics (according to the developers).

minimum_system_requirements.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580

title: RAVEN2
short_description: RAVEN2 is a dark fantasy MMORPG that features a vast open world, immersive storytelling, and massive cross-platform battles.
description:
RAVEN2 is a dark-fantasy MMORPG that emphasizes large-scale world exploration, fast-paced combat, and deep character progression. In a grim high-fantasy setting, players shape the fate of a war-torn realm through story-driven quests and open-world activities.

Players can choose from eight classes: Assassin, Berserker, Vanguard, Elementalist, Divine Caster, Night Ranger, Destroyer, and Deathbringer. Each offers unique roles and playstyles spanning stealth, melee, ranged, magic, and support. The game highlights strategic decision-making in battle, with abilities and class strengths influencing how players approach encounters.

Before starting, players are able to customize their characters with great detail to match personal preferences. Also, alongside moment-to-moment action combat, RAVEN 2 features large-scale conflicts that are visually dramatic and demand coordinated team play.

title: Warborne Above Ashes
short_description: Warborne Above Ashes is a 24/7 real-time PvP MMO where players become Driftmasters, ride massive behemoths, lead warbands, and battle across ever-changing, rule-free battlefields with thousands of others.
description:
Warborne Above Ashes is a nonstop, 24/7 real-time PvP MMO that drops you straight into the action with no story quests, no leveling grind, and no fixed modes. Players take on the role of Driftmasters, riding colossal behemoths, commanding war machines, and leading warbands across massive, ever-shifting battlefields with thousands of other players. The game offers everything from quick 1v1 duels to chaotic 100v100 wars, all unscripted and constantly evolving, encouraging creative strategies, dramatic comebacks, and dynamic encounters.

With over 40 Drifters to recruit, 100+ gear pieces to mix, and complete freedom to build your own playstyle, Warborne Above Ashes is designed as a skill-focused playground where you can use terrain, gadgets, vehicles, and even enemies to turn the tide of battle. Elite guilds can clash in truly lag-free, 200-player fights thanks to advanced tech, while a global trading hub lets players freely exchange gear and resources across servers. This is relentless, rule-free warfare for players who want instant action and endless possibilities.

minimum_system_requirements.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT

title: Eterspire
short_description: Eterspire is a free-to-play, cross-platform MMORPG where players progress through skill and dedication while enjoying biweekly content updates and crossplay on PC and mobile.
description:
Eterspire is a free-to-play, cross-platform fantasy MMORPG that delivers a true progression-based experience where skill and dedication drive your power.

Playable on PC with controller support, it lets players explore the handcrafted world of Aetera, complete quests, and battle monsters to earn gear — without pay-to-win shortcuts.

You can team up with up to four friends for wave-based PvE Trials, tackle the Bastion Challenge for leaderboard glory and cosmetic rewards, and craft cosmetics to personalize your look without sacrificing stats. The game thrives on its global community, encouraging players to chat, trade, and join events, while biweekly updates continually expand content, polish features, and keep the adventure fresh with new challenges and improvements.

title: Blade & Soul Heroes
short_description: Blade & Soul Heroes is a free-to-play collectible action MMORPG that blends turn-based strategy with real-time action, offering cross-platform play, epic quests, and team-based adventures.
description:
Blade & Soul Heroes is an anime-inspired free-to-play MMORPG that follows Yusol’s quest to rebuild her clan and seek justice against the villainous Yi Chun and the Heaven’s Fall Cult, all while uncovering a cast of over 40 unlockable heroes with unique skills and stories who can join her cause.

Featuring a dual combat system that lets players switch seamlessly between strategic turn-based battles with their full five-member team and fast-paced real-time action led by a chosen hero, the game emphasizes deep tactical combat where mastery of abilities, team composition, and skill combinations are key to victory. Set in the richly designed Earthen Realm, players will explore diverse environments — from majestic landscapes to eerie forests and mythical dungeons—  while customizing and growing their clan of heroes to confront ever-evolving threats.

minimum_system_requirements.graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 3G or AMD Radeon RX 480 8G or INTEL® Arc A380 (6GB, Alchemist)

title: Crystal of Atlan
short_description: A "magicpunk" MMO Action RPG where you and your allies build skills, battle enemies, and uncover the secrets of a wondrous world powered by magic and machinery.
description:
Crystal of Atlan features over 10 classes and more than 20 skill combinations each, encouraging creative builds and experimentation. Its dynamic combat system introduces fluid aerial combos and Z-axis movement for stylish, fast-paced battles.

Players can team up for challenging co-op dungeons, join guild fleets, and test their skills in balanced PvP modes where only mastery determines victory. With a richly imagined "magicpunk" world blending arcane power and advanced tech, adventurers are invited to uncover the secrets of Atlan and carve their own legendary path.

title: Odin: Valhalla Rising
short_description: Nordic mythology MMORPG fun in an open world on your PC or on the go.
description:
Having released back in 2021 on mobile devices in Korea, Odin: Valhalla Rising spent 17 weeks on the top of the Google Play Store charts. Developed by Lionheart Studio and published by Kakao Games, now it's time to take the fight global and to bring it to PC.

This free-tp-play, open-world MMORPG is firmly rooted in Nordic mythology and allows players to enter the dark, gritty side of a world embroiled in visceral combat. Choose from one of four classes (Sorceress, Priest, Rogue, or Warrior) and start exploring a world that includes mythological locations you've likely heard of like Midgard and Jotunheim.

Being on mobile devices hasn't stopped Odin: Valhalla Rising from including large-scale combat not only in PvE with dungeons and raids, but also in PvP. Group up for the 30v30 Battle of Valhalla or wait just a bit to roll with your guild in the upcoming guild battles. The lack of loading screens is also a nice touch for the genre.

Expect the global release to have a number of improvements over its Korean cousin including enhanced character and environment assets, comprehensive bug fixes, and a refined user interface for an "optimal player experience."

minimum_system_requirements.graphics: Higher than NVIDIA GeForce GTX9xx Series

title: Wuthering Waves
short_description: Wuthering Waves is an open-world action RPG with a lot of freedom to explore. Players wake up as Rover and team up with powerful allies called Resonators to recover lost memories and help change the world.
description:
Wuthering Waves is a story-driven, open-world action RPG with lots of freedom to explore. Players take on the role of Rover, who wakes up in a world that’s starting over after a disaster. Alongside a group of powerful characters called Resonators, players go on a journey to find lost memories and help shape the world’s future.

After the event called the Lament, the world became quiet and broken. But now, life is returning. As Rover, players begin a new adventure filled with mystery, battles, and choices that matter. Along the way, they’ll meet allies, fight enemies, and uncover hidden truths about the past and what comes next.

Exploring the world feels smooth and open. Players can fly, grapple, and wall-dash across the map without using much stamina. Combat is fast and easy to pick up, with dodge moves, counterattacks, Echo Skills, and quick-timed events that keep battles exciting. Resonators each have their own special powers and personalities, and they’ll fight alongside the player as a team. Players can also collect Echoes — powers from defeated enemies — to use in battle and gain an edge.

title: Path of Exile 2
short_description: One of the most successful ARPGs out there gets a follow-up title 11 years later.
description:
Believe it or not, the original Path of Exile has been around over 10 years. Launching in October 2013, Grinding Gear Games made their mark on the MMO/ARPG scene with their free-to-play title. Taking inspiration from Diablo and other action RPGs before them, GGG blazed their own path and created what many gamers feel is the perfect free-to-play game... and the perfect free-to-play game monetization.

The company is out to strike it rich twice now with the launch of Path of Exile 2. No, the original isn't going anywhere, these are two different games... but if you played the original and earned or purchased cosmetics, they are shared between games!

Almost everything about the original has received an overhaul in the sequel. While the dungeon-delving action will still be there, flasks, in-game currency, gems, existing bosses and over 100 new ones, the addition of a dodge roll, and more classes with more Ascendancies gives players greater control over their playstyle.

Cross play, cross progression, and even local couch co-op are all included from day one.

Dive into a whole new adventure as a new corruption is spreading throughout Wraeclast. Taking place years after the event of Path of Exile, PoE2 beckons both new and long-time players to try out the new systems in a way the team hopes makes the APRG more inviting (and maybe a bit less intimidating) for new players.

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700 or AMD™ Ryzen 5 2500x
minimum_system_requirements.graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 (3GB), Intel® Arc™ A380, or ATI Radeon™ RX 470

title: Once Human
short_description: Time to remake the world and uncover a few conspiracies along the way.
description:
Once Human has been one of the most globally wishlisted games on Steam for quite some time and now we've come to release day. Stardust, an alien creature infesting humans, animals, plants and even the soil you walk on, is wreaking havoc. Where did it come from? Who is behind the devastation? Can you survive long enough to find out? Walking around after an apocalypse always has its challenges.

Since you are Meta-Human, you have the capability to survive better in a post-Stardust world than most, but you aren't immune and your Sanity is at risk. You have to eat, but when eating could cost you some sanity, maybe you should choose that next meal carefully.

Taking place on a 256-square-kilometer map that allows for up to 4,000 players in its open world, Once Human blends together the best features of survival games and MMORPGs. Five regions, five factions, solo and group content, side quests, puzzles, and treasures... they're all there for the taking as you customize your weapon loadout and build your own slice of heaven (big or small, the choice is yours) in a world gone to hell.

title: Sky: Children of the Light
short_description: Take a beautiful trip through a wonderous world from the creators of "Journey.
description:
First off, Sky: Children of the Light is probably different from almost any other "MMO" you've ever played before. Don't go in trying to compare Sky to things like World of Warcraft or Final Fantasy XIV, it just doesn't fit into that kind of a bucket. Instead, Sky drops you in an artfully designed visual world comprised of multiple regions. Sure, you'll be doing quests, solving puzzles, and taking on trials to defend the realm from darkness, but that just covers the basics.

However, the real "Journey" (pun intended since that is the name of thatgamecompany's other well-known title) comes in exploring the vast world. Fly, run, and discover the lore behind a world specifically designed to inspire child-like wonder. As you explore, you'll team up with friends old and new utilizing social systems that encourage working together. If you're ever unsure of what to do next, hold hands (literally) with experienced players and take off on your next adventure.

Find your place in the world and express yourself through a vast array of cosmetics before your next flight!

minimum_system_requirements.graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1030 or AMD Radeon RX 560

title: Ravendawn Online
short_description: Get a bit nostalgic with an MMO that looks like games of the past, but plays a bit more modern.
description:
Tavernlight Games brings you that nostalgia hit from games like Tibia, but brings a more modern approach to systems and gameplay in Ravendawn Online. A top down view and a more classic look puts players in the role of world builder.

With classes that are fully customizable and a player-driven economy, Ravendawn Online allows players to play the way they wish. Want to farm your way to riches? How about buying your way into some land and maybe becoming a lord in the MMO's political system? Maybe taking to the vast fields to become the most powerful magic user in the realm is your forte?

All of this is possible. Hell, you can even steal your way to success if other players aren't fully protecting those valuable trade goods while in transport. The world is yours to claim, whether alone or with friends, but be careful, the world is a dangerous place!

title: Titan Revenge
short_description: Become an Angel or a Titan and smash your way to epic loot that ALWAYS has a benefit.
description:
The world of Titan Revenge is about to collapse. Things aren't going well, and that, my friend, is where you come in. Dive into the realms of Aesir and Vanir and wreak havoc on the gods and demons waiting there.

Based on Norse mythology, Titan Revenge is all about the combat and the loot. Whether you are gaining that best-in-slot or just farming up new customizations for your character, mounts, pets, and artifacts, nothing you pick up in your battles goes to waste. Loot that you have or can't use can be traded in for in-game currency or for increased odds on upgrading your existing high-end gear.

Titan Revenge offers multiple modes of play including 1v1, guild battles, and cross-server faction battles. Players can take on the dark world of monsters alone or with friends, either way, it's up to you to take down boss after boss.

title: Tales of Yore
short_description: An old school, small team MMORPG with nostalgic charm.
description:
Tales of Yore is the continuation of an older project from a small indie developer (Coke and Code) that hides a lot of fun behind a nostalgic visual style and loads of RPG tropes. Quest, gather, quest, kill monsters, and just chart your own tale.

While the game is billed as an "MMO", this PC and mobile game is more a social RPG. Yes, you can see other players, interact, chat, and more, but when it comes to gameplay, Tales of Yore is more a solo experience that is slowly adding more group oriented content over time.

Start your adventure in a world made up of over 250,000 tiles and enjoy a world where things are very tongue-in-cheek but also have consequences. Death matters in Tales of Yore.

title: Eden Eternal
short_description: Eden Eternal is a free-to-play 3D anime-style MMORPG from the developers of Kitsu Saga and Grand Fantasia. In Eden Eternal, players will trek across a magical realm filled with vibrant races (Humans, Beast Men, Frog Men and other half-animal races) and prosperous villages.
description:
Eden Eternal is a free-to-play 3D anime-style MMORPG from the developers of Kitsu Saga and Grand Fantasia. In Eden Eternal, players will trek across a magical realm filled with vibrant races (Humans, Beast Men, Frog Men and other half-animal races), robust monsters, and prosperous villages as they work to uncover ancient secrets surrounding the mysterious Soul Stone. Help the powerful Eternal Children solve the enigma of their origin and ultimately bring peace to the continent as part of your final quest. Players can customize their character’s armor and appearance with a surprising variety of colors and styles. Search Eden for additional rare and exotic dyes.

Freely switch between classes as you unlock them. As you progress through Eden, you will gain access to 15 unique classes. Help your guild create a thriving town in Eden. Become a respectable citizen by establishing cross-functional structures and mastering a valuable community trade. Eden Eternal’s also features a progressive title system as part of a variety of in-game achievements which are earnable throughout the quest series.

You may not be able to tell from the screenshots, but you will learn very quickly how fast paced the combat in Eden Eternal really is. Feel like a mighty warrior as you battle multiple enemies at once! Every MMO may have guilds, but in Eden Eternal your guild can build their very own town! Construct and upgrade buildings for various uses as you help your guild create a private bustling neighborhood.

title: Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore
short_description: An "old school MMORPG" that pays tribute to those that came before it.
description:
Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore, developed (and now published) by Gellyberry Studios is a free-to-play MMORPG that dips its toes into the old-school waters of games like RuneScape. With a bit of an "acquired taste" art style, Eythrial challenges players to survive in a world ravaged by civil war.

You'll be walking (slowly) around the world trying to team up with others (almost required) and working your stats (yes, they actually matter here), all in an effort to rebuild the world, literally. There is no instanced player housing here. Get materials, craft weapons, and stake a claim to land right in the world to call home.

Featuring both PvE and PvP content, including open world PvP where yes, you can lose your loot unless you have a friend grab it, Ethyrial wants to be your replacement for games gone by.

Currently the game is undergoing a drastic number of changes to model, publisher, staff, and more. This results in the devs being rather forthright in saying that updates will be few and far between during this transition, so stay tuned to the game's site for updates on future content.

minimum_system_requirements.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 8GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8GB

title: Summoners War: Chronicles
short_description: Discover the secrets of the Rahil Kingdom in this reimagined version of Summoners War
description:
Whether it's on PC or on mobile, Com2uS brings you Summoners War: Chronicles, a reimagined Summoners War with updated systems, stories, graphics, and more. 

Pick from one of 3 "Summoners" and journey through the Rahil Kingdom fighting and looting your way to power in this free-to-play MMORPG. Along the way you'll be exploring a large world, fighting your way through dungeons, hitting up the arena for PvP against your friends, and collecting some of the monsters you fight so they'll fight alongside you.

With over 350 monsters to collect and an action-based combat system, Summoners War: Chronicles challenges you to save the world by beating back the darkness seeping through rifts. Should you fail, the continents of the world will lay in ruin.

title: Torchlight: Infinite
short_description: 200 years after the events of Torchlight II we pick up the story both on PC and mobile in Torchlight: Infinite.
description:
The Torchlight series has always been a loot-fest ARPG in the same style as a Diablo or Path of Exile, but most of the previous iterations were single player affairs. Torchlight Frontiers was set to be the MMO-esque version but upon testing even that version of the game ended up becoming Torchlight III and converted to a more "traditional" Torchlight title...albeit with worse reviews.

Now we get Torchlight: Infinite, a PvE game available on both PC and mobile devices with cross-play enabled. Dive into dungeons, gather that loot, grind and repeat, you know the name of the game if you're even looking at a Torchlight game.

The team also encourages players to sell and trade with each other to get the best loot you can for your specific build (or which there are thousands using all the currently available classes).

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX-4350
minimum_system_requirements.graphics: Nvidia GTX 660Ti or AMD R9 270 with 2+ GB of VRAM

title: Aero Tales Online
short_description: Aero Tales Online uses a more classic Anime MMORPG art style to hit those nostalgia buttons for early 2000s MMO players.
description:
Aero Tales Online is a 3D free-to-play Anime MMORPG with plenty of side activities like Housing, Farming, and Playing Musical Instruments.

Aero Tales Online uses a more classic Anime MMORPG art style to hit those nostalgia buttons for early 2000s MMO players. Explore a vast world on either your PC or mobile devices with a character you customize (additional class advancement is available after leveling a bit).

In addition to secondary time sinks like housing, in-game marriage, and more, Aero Tales offers daily challenges and competitions on both the PvE and PvP front for players of either stripe. Explore the world on foot (or in air later in game) and solve clues that reveal more of the world’s mysteries.

title: Chimeraland
short_description: Chimeraland is a free-to-play sandbox MMO that has so many character customization options that some of you may be in the creator for hours… no joke
description:
You can literally create the ugliest monster of a character ever. That’s kind of the point, actually! Chimeraland is a free-to-play sandbox MMO that has so many character customization options that some of you may be in the creator for hours… no joke. Pick and mix your character’s features, lineage, and more. Are you a Jellyfish princess? Sure, go for it. How about a massive half-ox hulk? Also there…and everything in between.

Featuring the typical “gathering and crafting” experience found in other sandbox MMO titles, Chimeraland also adds in the whole monster catching gimmick to really capture the collectors among you. Catch, hatch, and raise new monsters all while exploring a massive open world available on both PC and mobile devices.

title: World of Rune
short_description: Explore a magical fantasy world in R2Games' latest 2D Browser MMORPG.
description:
R2Games is back with another 2D browser based MMORPG for you to take anywhere you have access to an internet browser. World of Rune introduces 4 classes each with specialized skill sets into a anime-inspired fantasy world and tasks them with collecting pets along their journey and using those pets to help along the way.

Adding in a card collecting mechanic, the ability to partner up with other characters, PvP, and a charming, almost "old-school RPG" art style, World of Rune may be your next favorite time sink when you're out and about or chilling and watching your favorite streaming service.

As a new player, be sure to check out the numerous guides on the game's site to get you started. These videos provide helpful pet information, equipment, guild, and card tutorials, and more. Well worth checking out before you embark on your World of Rune journey!

title: Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis
short_description: Defend the Planet Halpha against the threat of the DOLLS in F2P sci-fi MMORPG Phantasy Star Online 2: New Genesis! PSO2:NG is a remastered version of the original PSO2, with stunning new graphics and gameplay features.
description:
Defend the Planet Halpha against the threat of the DOLLS in F2P sci-fi MMORPG Phantasy Star Online 2: New Genesis! PSO2:NG is a remastered version of the original PSO2, with stunning new graphics and gameplay features. Become a member of the ARKS and battle against the mysterious enemy in a wide-open futuristic world!

New Genesis takes the base Phantasy Star Online game and improves upon it in nearly every way. Urgent quests, scratch tickets, and a fantastic class and battle system are all still there, complementing additional character creation options and emotes. Take the fight to the stars and bear witness to an epic and heroic saga!

title: Blankos Block Party
short_description: Play in a multitude of fanciful worlds in Blankos Block Party, a free and wide open multiplayer game from Mythical. Get your Blanko, give it a special power, and set it off on an adventure in The Junction, a colorful and vibrant world that serves as your hub to many others.
description:
Play in a multitude of fanciful worlds in Blankos Block Party, a free and wide open multiplayer game from Mythical. Get your Blanko, give it a special power, and set it off on an adventure in The Junction, a colorful and vibrant world that serves as your hub to many others.

Activities in Blankos include shooting, racing, and collection games, all of which you can design yourself without any knowledge of coding. You can even collect and trade Blankos to try and find the most valuable ones out there. Play by yourself or party up with friends for the ultimate adventure!

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or AMD FX 8310
minimum_system_requirements.graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870

title: Jade Goddess
short_description: Set out on an epic journey in a world inspired by Eastern mythology in 101xp's free-to-play browser MMORPG Jade Goddess. Choose one of four classes and recruit powerful allies in a number of different battle types to protect the people of the Jade Dynasty.
description:
Set out on an epic journey in a world inspired by Eastern mythology in 101xp's free-to-play browser MMORPG Jade Goddess. Choose one of four classes and recruit powerful allies in a number of different battle types to protect the people of the Jade Dynasty. Upgrade your character's equipment for even more power, and rise in the ranks to achieve even greater glory and rewards!

Jade Goddess will challenge you with PvE and PvP encounters, in arena and siege battles. Discover long-forgotten artifacts and use them to unlock amazing astral powers or tame a mount for additional travel options. Need a break from adventuring? Then enjoy Jade Goddess's myriad social features and get married!

title: Kakele Online
short_description: Kind of like if Gauntlet was an MMORPG... and a bit cuter looking.
description:
ViVa Games brings its free-to-play MMORPG Kakele Online to both PC and mobile devices. With a cute 2D pixel art style, Kakele is a tile based game with over 100,000 tiles making up the open world. You're free to explore to your heart's content, dive into dungeons bringing many players together, tackle huge bosses, and of course, loot that treasure.

PvP fans will find there's plenty on offer here in both open world and mode-based PvP offerings. There's even Guild and PvP War systems in the game.

While the game is also cross platform with mobile devices, there are no ads in the game and no "pay-to-win" as all cash purchase offerings aren't required for gameplay advancement. Kakele is still undergoing development so additional features are being added and polished on a regular schedule.

minimum_system_requirements.os: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
minimum_system_requirements.processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

title: League of Angels - Heaven's Fury
short_description: Embark on an epic quest to save world in League of Angels - Heaven's Fury, the latest entry in the free-to-play browser-based MMORPG franchise. Play as a mighty Dragoon, the enigmatic Mage, or deadly Archer and recruit your team of angels from the sides of light and darkness to fight against demonic beasts and their vile masters in a gorgeously rendered fantasy world.
description:
Embark on an epic quest to save world in League of Angels - Heaven's Fury, the latest entry in the free-to-play browser-based MMORPG franchise. Play as a mighty Dragoon, the enigmatic Mage, or deadly Archer and recruit your team of angels from the sides of light and darkness to fight against demonic beasts and their vile masters in a gorgeously rendered fantasy world.

As you advance, you'll upgrade your skills and talents to take on even more powerful enemies. Progress even further to upgrade your skills and unlock your relics, holy artifacts, and divine weapons to put even more hurt on your foes. Take on the toughest PvE world raid bosses or engage in real-time PvP to prove your dominance!

title: Inferna
short_description: Journey across the vast world of Pangeau and defend the kingdom of your choice in free-to-play MMORPG Inferna. Choose from four races and four character classes and learn the intricate history of the world as you engage in thrilling adventures and quests!
description:
Journey across the vast world of Pangeau and defend the kingdom of your choice in free-to-play MMORPG Inferna. Choose from four races and four character classes and learn the intricate history of the world as you engage in thrilling adventures and quests!

Inferna offers intricate combat and adventuring throughout a vast land, with plans to add more functionality in the future: guilds, crafting, and mobile supporat are just three of the features that are on the table. Climb the rankings to prove you're the best warrior in all of Pangeau and reap the rewards!

title: Mirage Online Classic
short_description: An MMORPG truly made to run on any computer at any time.
description:
Jump into a constantly evolving 2D world inspired by the 2001 MMO Mirage Online. In this updated "classic" version, you can play as one of 6 different classes and explore the world collecting your loot and fighting mosters either on PC via Steam or a browser. The game encourages player feedback and incorporates that feedback into future development and maintains a low barrier of entry spec wise as almost any current PC will be able to run the game flawlessly.

Picking from over 30 subclasses, you'll explore over 20 dungeons on your adventure. Pick and mix your skills to give you the edge against the world's many monsters as you gear up and explore. Originally a casual project, Mirage Online Classic has evolved into a full HTML 5 Javascript powered engine.

title: Stay Out
short_description: Survive on the edge of civilization in Stay Out, a free-to-play post-apocalyptic MMORPG from Mobile Technologies LLC. Become a "stalker," exploring the vast and hostile Alienation Zone in search of artifacts, but tread carefully -- dangerous creatures lurk in the dark, and you'll need all your wits, and a quick trigger finger, to survive.
description:
Survive on the edge of civilization in Stay Out, a free-to-play post-apocalyptic MMORPG from Mobile Technologies LLC. Become a "stalker," exploring the vast and hostile Alienation Zone in search of artifacts, but tread carefully -- dangerous creatures lurk in the dark, and you'll need all your wits, and a quick trigger finger, to survive.

Go it alone or team up with your fellow stalkers to hunt the biggest prey and uncover the greatest secrets that the world has to offer. Discover secret laboratories, strange and alien life forms, and other anomalies that will challenge our knowledge of the laws of nature.

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 (or better)

title: Firestone Idle RPG
short_description: Set in the fantasy world of Alandria, Firestone is an idle RPG in which players are tasked with building the best possible party of heroes and using them to defeat the undead and orcs that plague the world. While normally a threat on their own, the two races have joined forces and are using the power of the Firestones to wreak havoc upon the land.
description:
Set in the fantasy world of Alandria, Firestone is an idle RPG in which players are tasked with building the best possible party of heroes and using them to defeat the undead and orcs that plague the world. While normally a threat on their own, the two races have joined forces and are using the power of the Firestones to wreak havoc upon the land.

Build your team, equip them well and send them on missions to defeat the monsters. As with any RPG, your team will need to be well balanced and upgraded regularly using the best gear – either obtained through battles or upgrades. Players can also make use of guardians – angel or dragons – in battle to destroy their foes. Guardians can be unlocked over time and evolved in order to make use of their full power.

Upgrading also includes doing research via the Library and conducting alchemy experiments. As for the Firestones themselves, these can be used with the game’s Prestige mechanism in order to influence progression.

title: Legends of Aria
short_description: Choose your path and create your legacy in Legends of Aria a free-to-play sandbox MMORPG from Citadel Studios. Create your character exactly how you want it, choosing from over 30 skills, and put yourself to the test in a vast open world where danger lurks around every corner.
description:
Choose your path and create your legacy in Legends of Aria a free-to-play sandbox MMORPG from Citadel Studios. Create your character exactly how you want it, choosing from over 30 skills, and put yourself to the test in a vast open world where danger lurks around every corner. Take on dangerous monsters or even more dangerous players and write your story the way you want to!

Legends of Aria offers a wide range of activities and ways to progress, including combat, crafting, and housing. Join a guild and fight with your allies or take on the world alone. Take your chances on a public server or host a private server for you and your friends -- or enemies. You'll have no lack of choices in Legends of Aria!

title: Eternal Fury
short_description: Play a part in the battle between gods and giants in Eternal Fury, a free-to-play ARPG from R2 Games. Heaven and Hell are at war, and the realm of man is caught in between.
description:
Play a part in the battle between gods and giants in Eternal Fury, a free-to-play ARPG from R2 Games. Heaven and Hell are at war, and the realm of man is caught in between. Drive back the goddess of the underworld, Hel, and her bloodthirsty minions, before they ravage the world!

You'll erect a castle and use it as your base of operations against the hordes of demons. You won't have to play alone, either, with a guild system and up to 24 NPCs that you can summon into battle. You can also go on a "Crusade" to attack other players and plunder their castles.

title: Stein.world
short_description: Take part in an immersive multiplayer online fantasy world in Stein, a charming free-to-play social browser-based MMORPG from pg5-studio. Embark on hundreds of quests and take on challenging wave dungeons -- or just enjoy the social aspects of the game!
description:
Take part in an immersive multiplayer online fantasy world in Stein, a charming free-to-play social browser-based MMORPG from pg5-studio. Embark on hundreds of quests and take on challenging wave dungeons -- or just enjoy the social aspects of the game!

Stein has hundreds of items and countless ways to customize your character's equipment, so you'll have plenty of different ways to play your character. Future improvements will include professions, PvP, housing, farming, mounts, pets, and much more!

title: League of Angels 3
short_description: Embark on an epic quest to save world in League of Angels III.
description:
Embark on an epic quest to save world in League of Angels III, the latest entry in the free-to-play browser-based MMORPG franchise. Recruit your team of angels to fight against demonic beasts and their vile masters in a gorgeously rendered fantasy world.

League of Angels III's simple gameplay and interface puts you in the action quickly, but there's a surprising amount of strategy involved. Your party's makeup and equipment is crucial to your success, and you need to choose the right time to activate your angels' special abilities to maximize your damage against difficult foes.

Boasting a rich and detailed storyline, League of Angels III immerses you in its beautiful game world. With a large map to explore, a diverse roster of characters, and several different types of battles, League of Angels III has plenty of content to keep you interested for a long time.

title: Will To Live
short_description: Will to Live is a free-to-play MMORPG-shooter developed and published by AlphaSoft LLC. Set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, the game is an open-world shooter littered with radiation, mutants, and other survivors.
description:
Will to Live is a free-to-play MMORPG-shooter developed and published by AlphaSoft LLC. Set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, the game is an open-world shooter littered with radiation, mutants, and other survivors. To survive, players will not only need to contend with the above but also manage their health via hunger and thirst mechanics.

While exploring the open world, players will not only fight players and other NPCs but discover the world’s history, gather resources, trade, and more.

Players can create up to four characters in Will to Live — allowing them to have one of each class. Each class has its own equipment featuring realistic behavior that takes ballistics and specs into account. The weapons can be modified as well.

title: SoulWorker
short_description: Put your soul to work in SoulWorker, the free-to-play action MMORPG from VALOFE that uses your very soul as a weapon!
description:
Put your soul to work in SoulWorker, the free-to-play action MMORPG from VALOFE that uses your very soul as a weapon!

Demons from the void are trying to wipe out all of humanity, and it's up to a small band of fighters to hold them off. Tap into your soul and wield your innermost feelings as a weapon to fight off the demon hordes!

SoulWorker offers fast-paced anime action, requiring precise reflexes to activate your devastating combos. Participate in PvE action, including over a hundred challenging dungeons, alone or with a group of up to four players, or test your skills in PvP in a vast, open battlefield. In SoulWorker, your weapon is the window to your soul -- harness that power to come out victorious!

title: Dead Maze
short_description: Take on the zombie hordes in Dead Maze, a free-to-play 2D massively multiplayer cooperative game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
description:
Take on the zombie hordes in Dead Maze, a free-to-play 2-D massively multiplayer cooperative game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players will have to work together to hunt and survive and to rebuild society. Watch your health and thirst, watch your fatigue, but most of all, watch your back -- there could be a zombie lurking right behind you ...

As you play, you'll accumulate enough materials to build your own shelter and even grow crops and raise animals to supplement your food supply. There are over 500 weapons in the game you can use to slash, smash, and incinerate the zombie hordes, but be careful out there!

title: Scions of Fate
short_description: Scions of Fate (Yulgang in Asia) is 3D Fantasy MMORPG very popular in Korea and china with more than 100 million fans. Game features include faction based PvP, guild system (House), and players run shops.
description:
Scions of Fate (Yulgang in Asia) is 3D Fantasy MMORPG very popular in Korea and china with more than 100 million fans. Game features include faction based PvP, guild system (House), and players run shops. Scions of Fatea brightly colored anime styled game with eye catching graphics, the gameplay is simple and beginner friendly.

There are six classes to chose from: Swordsman, Bladesman, Archer, Healer, Spearman, and Ninja. Their movement is done by simple point and click with double click activating attack.

If you’re looking for a free MMORPG that’s not too complicated, give the game a try.

title: Wild Terra Online
short_description: Make friends, make enemies, and survive the elements in Wild Terra Online, a free-to-play survival MMORPG from Juvty Worlds Ltd.
description:
Make friends, make enemies, and survive the elements in Wild Terra Online, a free-to-play survival MMORPG from Juvty Worlds Ltd. With over 100 buildings to choose from, you can build your settlement up from scratch and defend it from all comers in skill-based combat, or just engage in crafting and the economical aspects of the game. Just watch out for bears!

Wild Terra Online offers plenty of ways to advance, and it's all up to you as to how you proceed. Whether you choose combat, building, or trade, you'll find something to keep your occupied and entertained -- if you survive!

title: Closers
short_description: In Closers, a free-to-play fighting MMORPG, horrific creatures are springing from mysterious dimensional gates all around New Seoul, and it's up to you to stop them!
description:
In Closers, a free-to-play fighting MMORPG, horrific creatures are springing from mysterious dimensional gates all around New Seoul, and it's up to you to stop them! Play as one of several psychic warriors, each with their own unique backstory and special abilities, and reclaim Korea!

Like many side-scrolling fighting games, in Closers, you'll advance through a series of instanced dungeons, mowing down anything that stands in your way. Closers has a large number of different areas for you to explore, and a wide variety of monsters to fight, and the more characters you level up, the stronger your powers will be! Travel throughout New Seoul or partake in the Union Arena mode to do battle against other players.

title: La Tale Evolved
short_description: LaTale is a free-to-play 2D side-scrolling fantasy MMORPG with anime inspired graphics, lots of quests and a massive player base.
description:
LaTale is a free to play 2D side-scrolling fantasy MMORPG with anime inspired graphics, lots of quests and a massive player base. Simple gameplay and intuitive quests make LaTale accessible for players of all ages, while a large, immersive world promises hours of entertainment.

LaTale also offers various types of gameplay and customization, giving unique play styles to all types of gamers. Various character classes, equipment items, and upgrade skills allow players to develop unique characters. Players can also personalize their characters with pets and accessories, as well as cute costumes and unique, expressive emoticons.

title: Luna Online: Reborn
short_description: Relive your favorite Luna Online memories with Luna Online: Reborn, Suba Games' remake of the anime-styled free-to-play MMORPG! Set in the fantasy world of Blueland, Luna Online: Reborn takes all that was great about Luna Online and adds even more, while removing many of the restrictions and annoyances of its predecessor.
description:
Relive your favorite Luna Online memories with Luna Online: Reborn, Suba Games' remake of the anime-styled free-to-play MMORPG! Set in the fantasy world of Blueland, Luna Online: Reborn takes all that was great about Luna Online and adds even more, while removing many of the restrictions and annoyances of its predecessor. For example, you can choose the character you want to play right out of the gate with no restrictions, and readjust your skills if you don't like your initial choices.

Once in the game, you'll have a variety of activities to keep you occupied. Take part in epic guild vs. guild and realm vs. realm battles, or take down epic raid bosses to secure some sweet gear. If you're of a more peaceful mind, you can focus on building your house, farming, or taming pets. You can even get into the social scene, building affection with other players, getting married, and even starting a family!

title: NosTale
short_description: NosTale is a free-to-play anime action MMORPG.
description: NosTale invites you to embark on exciting adventures through a world full of mystery. Create your own unique character and become a Swordsman, Archer, or Mage as each class offers a unique flavor and different specialties. The fan-favorite pet system allows you to tame wild animals, train them, and use them tactically in battle.

title: Gods Origin Online
short_description: Gods Origin Online is a 2D free-to-play browser MMORPG where you'll fight alongside the gods themselves in an epic war of faith. Perform various tasks, such as daily quests and storyline quests to advance your character and eventually you'll be able to summon the gods themselves to aid you in battle!
description:
Gods Origin Online is a 2D free-to-play browser MMORPG where you'll fight alongside the gods themselves in an epic war of faith. Perform various tasks, such as daily quests and storyline quests to advance your character and eventually you'll be able to summon the gods themselves to aid you in battle!

You'll need solid strategy to win your battles, deploying your characters in lines to properly make the most use of your skills. Participate in special events for treasure, and when you need a break, you can even idle in the game to gain Wisdom points, which increase your battle rating.

title: Secret World Legends
short_description: Experience the rich, handcrafted storyline and moody atmosphere of Funcom's The Secret World in its free-to-play spinoff, Secret World Legends! Featuring the same gameplay as TSW, Secret World Legends offers improved combat, a re-designed progression system, and updated visuals, breathing new life into this classic MMORPG.
description:
Experience the rich, handcrafted storyline and moody atmosphere of Funcom's The Secret World in its free-to-play spinoff, Secret World Legends! Featuring the same gameplay as TSW, Secret World Legends offers improved combat, a re-designed progression system, and updated visuals, breathing new life into this classic MMORPG.

As an initiate in one of three secret societies, you'll travel around the world, from New England to Egypt to Transylvania, uncovering mysteries and fighting unspeakable horrors. Along the way, you'll discover and solve mysteries that require more brainpower than combat skills, and make allies and enemies both natural and supernatural. Unlock hidden secrets and fight unseen powers to unravel the mysteries of the Secret World!

minimum_system_requirements.processor: 2.6 GHZ Intel Core 2 DUO or equivalent AMD CPU
minimum_system_requirements.memory: 2 GB for Windows XP/3GB for Vista and 7

title: Pixel Worlds
short_description: Create your own world and enjoy endless customization in Pixel Worlds, a 2D free-to-play MMORPG from Kukouri Mobile Entertainment!
description:
Create your own world and enjoy endless customization in Pixel Worlds, a 2-D free-to-play MMORPG from Kukouri Mobile Entertainment that's now on Steam! Gather resources through mining and farming, using what you can to build and trading away what you can't to other players, thanks to an economy that's 100% created by the players.

Pixel Worlds boasts a vibrant and engaged community and active forums where you can show off your creations, seek building tips, or just chat with other players. Play across multiple platforms -- PC, Apple, and Android -- and build the world of your dreams!

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or AMD X2 64 2.0 Ghz
minimum_system_requirements.graphics: 256 MB HD 2600 or better \ 256 MB Nvidia 7900 or better

title: Chronicles of Eidola
short_description: Embark on an epic adventure with revolutionary graphics and gameplay in Chronicles of Eidola, a free-to-play, turn-based browser MMORPG from AMZGame! CoE uses a new 3-D engine to render its colorful characters, spell and weapon effects, and ferocious monsters in stunning detail.
description:
Embark on an epic adventure with revolutionary graphics and gameplay in Chronicles of Eidola, a free-to-play, turn-based browser MMORPG from AMZGame! CoE uses a new 3-D engine to render its colorful characters, spell and weapon effects, and ferocious monsters in stunning detail. Recruit heroes and devils alike to join you in battle against your foes!

There are many ways to enjoy the game, including PvE, PvP, and other activities. Group up with friends and engage in intense, tactical, turn-based battles. Your leader will need to arrange your forces in just the right order to have maximum effect on the enemy, whether in PvE or PvP. For the ultimate challenge, take on the Gauntlet and see how far you can go to win epic prizes!

title: MU Legend
short_description: Fight against the God of Destruction in Mu Legend, the free-to-play action RPG follow-up to Webzen's popular Mu Online. The attempt to hide evil in a human body failed, causing death and destruction on a massive scale.
description:
Fight against the God of Destruction in Mu Legend, the free-to-play action RPG follow-up to Webzen's popular Mu Online. The attempt to hide evil in a human body failed, causing death and destruction on a massive scale. It's up to you, one of the grim warriors of this new world, to use a mix of blades and spells to carve a path through the minions of darkness and prevent total annihilation!

There are lots of venues in Mu Legend for you to slice and dice your way to glory. Step into the Rift to take on foes in procedurally generated worlds or challenge the Endless Tower or Lupa's Labyrinth and battle wave after wave of bloodthirsty hordes. Try your hand at PvP in 1v1, 5v5, and 10v10 contests, and join a guild to recruit more fighters to your cause. The battle is endless, but so are your options for destroying your enemies!

minimum_system_requirements.processor: Intel Quad Core/AMD Phenom II X4 and above

title: Therian Saga
short_description: Therian Saga is a free to play browser-based sandbox MMORPG with strategy elements where players create a unique character to explore, hunt, train, and craft. Therian Saga is not your typical role-playing game, this browser MMORPG, published by Gameforge AG, offers turn-based combat, a complex crafting system, a task-based queue system and Dungeons and Dragons-inspired dungeon crawling.
description:
Therian Saga is a free to play browser-based sandbox MMORPG with strategy elements where players create a unique character to explore, hunt, train, and craft.

Therian Saga is not your typical role-playing game, this browser MMORPG, published by Gameforge AG, offers turn-based combat, a complex crafting system, a task-based queue system and Dungeons and Dragons-inspired dungeon crawling. Though the game has a low player based and can sometimes be slow-paced, one of the game’s redeeming qualities is its detailed customization. Players can choose from a myriad of skills and various aesthetic choices to contrive their own unique character to progress through the game with.

Additionally, players can queue up certain tasks for their avatar, which they will complete over time to meet the requirements of various game objectives.

title: Dragon Awaken
short_description: Awaken your inner dragon in Dragon Awaken, a free-to-play browser MMORPG where you take on the powers of a dragon to defend your kingdom! Level up your character, face challenging dungeons, earn mounts, and -- most of all -- harness the power of a dragon!
description:
Awaken your inner dragon in Dragon Awaken, a free-to-play browser MMORPG where you take on the powers of a dragon to defend your kingdom! Level up your character, face challenging dungeons, earn mounts, and -- most of all -- harness the power of a dragon!

Dragon Awaken is a semi-turn-based game with multi-tier dynamic scenes, simulation, and PvP. An immersive story and multilayered backgrounds provide added depth to the game, which stands out from other browser games with its storytelling and graphics.

title: AdventureQuest 3D
short_description: AdventureQuest 3D is Artix Entertainment's free-to-play follow-up to AdventureQuest Worlds, offering a fantastic MMORPG experience across multiple platforms.
description:
AdventureQuest 3D is Artix Entertainment's free-to-play follow-up to AdventureQuest Worlds, offering a fantastic MMORPG experience across multiple platforms. Explore an ever-expanding world, battle dangerous monsters, and capture amazing loot! Experience a familiar world but with an added dimension on your PC, iOS- or Android-enabled device, and play with your friends on their devices, too!

While still maintaining the old-school charm of its predecessor, AQ3D includes many modern conveniences, like the ability to play on the same level as your friends, daily login rewards, exploration achievements, and PvP arenas. As with its previous games, which were updated on a weekly basis, Artix Entertainment will update the game regularly, adding new content and new lands to explore, along with an action-packed storyline that's sure to please players of all skill levels!

title: Omega Zodiac
short_description: Fight for the goddess Athena and earn amazing rewards in Omega Zodiac, a free-to-play browser-based action MMORPG from Proficient City and Game Hollywood. Choose one of three classes: the melee knight, the nimble archer, or the arcane mage, each with its own play style and special powers.
description:
Fight for the goddess Athena and earn amazing rewards in Omega Zodiac, a free-to-play browser-based action MMORPG from Proficient City and Game Hollywood. Choose one of three classes: the melee knight, the nimble archer, or the arcane mage, each with its own play style and special powers.
